${ModID}:Accelerate.NAME: Accelerate
${ModID}:Accelerate.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Discard !M! cards.

${ModID}:BigOlBite.NAME: Big Ol' Bite
${ModID}:BigOlBite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Blazing.NAME: Blazing
${ModID}:Blazing.DESCRIPTION: Choose an Attack. NL Increase its damage by !M! this combat.

${ModID}:BonesOut.NAME: Bones Out
${ModID}:BonesOut.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Attack deals 9 or more unblocked damage, apply !M! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:BuryTheLight.NAME: Bury the Light
${ModID}:BuryTheLight.DESCRIPTION: If you are in ${ModID}:Shadow, gain {@@}{!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]} , otherwise enter Succubus:Shadow.

${ModID}:Evasion.NAME: Evasion
${ModID}:Evasion.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exit your Stance. NL Draw !M! card{@@}{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:FireBolt.NAME: Fire Bolt
${ModID}:FireBolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you are in ${ModID}:Flame, deal !D! damage again.

${ModID}:Firewall.NAME: Firewall
${ModID}:Firewall.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust any number of cards. Gain !B! Block for each card Exhausted. NL Enter ${ModID}:Flame.

${ModID}:Gambler.NAME: Gambler
${ModID}:Gambler.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you discard a card from your hand, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:HeartBreaker.NAME: Heart Breaker
${ModID}:HeartBreaker.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP from a card, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

${ModID}:HeavyImpact.NAME: Heavy Impact
${ModID}:HeavyImpact.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you are in a Stance, exit it and deal double damage.

${ModID}:HostageTaker.NAME: Hostage Taker
${ModID}:HostageTaker.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, the enemy also takes !M! damage.

${ModID}:ImageChange.NAME: Image Change
${ModID}:ImageChange.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain {@@}{!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]} , but draw !M! less card{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:Jettison.NAME: Jettison
${ModID}:Jettison.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Discard up to !M! cards.

${ModID}:LifeEssence.NAME: Life Essence
${ModID}:LifeEssence.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Heal HP equal to unblocked damage dealt. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:LightTheTorch.NAME: Light the Torch
${ModID}:LightTheTorch.DESCRIPTION: If you are in ${ModID}:Flame, draw !M! cards, otherwise enter Succubus:Flame.

${ModID}:LoveBeam.NAME: Love Beam
${ModID}:LoveBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has ${ModID}:Charm, gain {@@}{!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]} and draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:Malice.NAME: Malice
${ModID}:Malice.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, if you are in ${ModID}:Shadow, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:NullCard.NAME: Null
${ModID}:NullCard.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Exit your Stance. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Overheat.NAME: Overheat
${ModID}:Overheat.DESCRIPTION: Enter ${ModID}:Flame. NL Draw X cards. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Phantasm.NAME: Phantasm
${ModID}:Phantasm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:Pheromones.NAME: Pheromones
${ModID}:Pheromones.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage, apply !M! ${ModID}:Charm.

${ModID}:PrecisionStrike.NAME: Precision Strike
${ModID}:PrecisionStrike.DESCRIPTION: Discard 1 card. NL Deal damage equal to !D! times its cost.

${ModID}:Reflexes.NAME: Reflexes
${ModID}:Reflexes.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If the enemy intends to Attack, gain {@@}{!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]} .

${ModID}:ReturnSweep.NAME: Return Sweep
${ModID}:ReturnSweep.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If this card is discarded from your hand, play a copy of it.

${ModID}:Sanctuary.NAME: Sanctuary
${ModID}:Sanctuary.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL While held, cards will not Exhaust on play.

${ModID}:Sedate.NAME: Sedate
${ModID}:Sedate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:SexyAura.NAME: Sexy Aura
${ModID}:SexyAura.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you change Stances, apply !M! ${ModID}:Charm to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:ShadeSpirit.NAME: Shade Spirit
${ModID}:ShadeSpirit.DESCRIPTION: Enter ${ModID}:Shadow. NL If the enemy intends to Attack, gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:SoulSeeker.NAME: Soul Seeker
${ModID}:SoulSeeker.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills an enemy, gain {@@}{!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]} . NL Enter Succubus:Shadow.

${ModID}:Supplies.NAME: Supplies
${ModID}:Supplies.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Ethereal. NL If this card is Exhausted, draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:SwanSong.NAME: Swan Song
${ModID}:SwanSong.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if there are no other cards in your hand. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I have other cards in my hand.

${ModID}:TailWhip.NAME: Tail Whip
${ModID}:TailWhip.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply ${ModID}:Charm equal to unblocked damage dealt.

${ModID}:Thunderbolt.NAME: Thunderbolt
${ModID}:Thunderbolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:TwinClaw.NAME: Twin Claw
${ModID}:TwinClaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Increase this card's damage by !M! this combat.

${ModID}:UnstablePower.NAME: Unstable Power
${ModID}:UnstablePower.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain Block equal to {@@}{!M!|>1=!M! times }its cost.

${ModID}:ViolentWaltz.NAME: Violent Waltz
${ModID}:ViolentWaltz.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies twice. NL ${ModID}:Finale: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies again.
